articles.author: WION Video Team
articles.title: Gravitas: A knife which can detect cancer in seconds - WION
articles.description: A surgical knife can detect cancer tissue in seconds, say experts. The breakthrough could save the lives of thousands of women. Priyanka Sharma tells you more.
articles.content: A surgical knife can detect cancer tissue in seconds, say experts. The breakthrough could save the lives of thousands of women. Priyanka Sharma tells you more.

articles.title: 4.74 lakh children to get additional dose of measles vaccine in Maha - Inshorts
articles.description: Maharashtra government has identified 4.74 lakh children under the age of five for an additional dose of measles vaccine. At least 2.47 lakh of these children have already been immunised. The first phase of the immunisation drive was completed on December 25 …
